titleStmt.title: An Elegy on the death of that reverend divine, and truely pious, humble, charitable servant of our Lord Jesus Christ, Mr. John Turnor, late of Hatton-Garden who departed this life the 18th of February, and was interr'd the 22th day of the same moneth, 1692 [i.e. 1693]

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
